author: @andaluciainf
title: Maduro ordena "acción defensiva" en el Atlántico ante llegada de buque británico a Guyana | Andalucía Información. Todas las noticias de Huelva
text: El presidente de Venezuela, Nicolás Maduro, ordenó este jueves una "acción defensiva" en el océano Atlántico en respuesta a la llegada de un buque de guerra británico a las costas de Guyana, lo que ha disparado nuevamente la tensión entre los países suramericanos por su disputa territorial. "He ordenado la activación de una acción conjunta de toda la Fuerza Armada Nacional Bolivariana (FANB) sobre el Caribe oriental de Venezuela, sobre la fachada atlántica, una acción conjunta de carácter defensivo como respuesta a la provocación y a la amenaza del Reino Unido contra la paz y la soberanía de nuestro país", dijo el mandatario. El anuncio lo hizo frente a la cúpula militar, durante una reunión que fue transmitida de manera obligatoria en la radio y televisión, en la que se comunicó con un grupo de efectivos castrenses que concretaron "la primera fase" de esta operación, lo que consistió en un despliegue sobre tierra y aguas del estado Sucre (noreste). Maduro no dio detalles sobre el alcance y duración de esta operación pero insistió en que la llegada del HMS Trent británico es una "amenaza inaceptable" que supone una "ruptura" de los acuerdos que suscribió con su homólogo guyanés, Irfaan Ali, el pasado 14 de diciembre, cuando se comprometieron a no amenazarse mutuamente y evitar incidentes relacionadas con la disputa. "Venezuela no se puede quedar de brazos cruzados frente a una amenaza, estamos respondiendo en la medida proporcional", aseguró tras reiterar que apuesta por la diplomacia y la paz. El líder chavista criticó que Guyana haya desoído las peticiones de Caracas de no aceptar la llegada del barco británico a sus costas. Minutos antes, el Gobierno venezolano había condenado este hecho en un comunicado, en el que pidió a Georgetown "tomar acciones inmediatas para el retiro del buque y abstenerse de seguir involucrando potencias militares en la controversia". La disputa escaló después de que Venezuela aprobara el 3 de diciembre, en un referendo unilateral, anexionarse la zona bajo pleito, un área de casi 160.000 kilómetros cuadrados que está bajo control de Guyana y que actualmente discute la Corte Internacional de Justicia. Envía tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)

author: Christopher Salas
title: First severe bird flu case in the US reported
text:
First severe bird flu case in the US reported
Doctors across the country are growing concerned about the spread of bird flu.
"The concern comes today because we've checked one of those boxes, the severity of illness, and that's something that we had not seen in the prior cases this year," said Dr. Jeremy Faust, a Harvard emergency medicine professor.
A patient in Louisiana is hospitalized in critical condition with the nation's first known severe illness from bird flu.
Health officials report the patient is older than 65, has underlying medical problems, and was exposed to a backyard flock of sick birds.
So far, more than 60 people in eight states have experienced mild illness related to the virus.
And while it's named "bird flu," it's really affecting dairy cows, infecting at least 866 herds in 16 states since March.
More than half of those cases are in California, where the governor declared an emergency.
"We have lots of ways we're monitoring it. We're hopeful that the emergency declaration will make some of those ways more streamlined," said Dr. Cameron Kaiser, deputy public health officer for Solano County, California.
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says people in contact with dairy cows, commercial poultry, or backyard birds are at higher risk.
There has been no person-to-person transmission identified.
The virus can also spread in raw milk.
"I think, given this situation, it makes sense to have a heightened scrutiny on those products and to be careful," said Dr. Jeremy Faust.
The Food and Drug Administration says pasteurized milk is safe because the heat treatment kills the virus.
Just this week, the United States Department of Agriculture started testing raw milk in 13 states to help detect and contain bird flu.

author: Ryan Hansen
title: 20 Simple Hacks For Your Garage to Maximize Space and Cut Clutter
text:
We all know the struggle: your garage, once a space for your car and tools, has transformed into a black hole of useless items. But fear not! In this article, we will explore 20 genius garage hacks that will rescue your garage from the jaws of disorganization. By implementing these hacks, you can create a tidy and stress-free space that enhances both functionality and aesthetics.
20. Upcycle A Wooden Pallet For Storage Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Transforming an old wooden pallet into a holder for brooms, rakes, and shovels is a fantastic way to keep your items off the floor and easily accessible. This hack not only saves costs but also promotes recycling, making it an eco-friendly choice. By mounting the pallet on the wall, you can create a designated space for your tools, ensuring they are always within reach when you need them.
Additionally, this method allows for better organization, as you can categorize your tools based on their use. Whether you’re a gardening enthusiast or a DIY warrior, having your tools neatly arranged will save you time and effort when tackling projects.
19. Wrench Storage Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Installing a belt rack on your garage wall is a simple yet effective way to create a wrench holder. This method keeps your wrenches visible and organized, saving you precious time when searching for the right tool. Instead of rummaging through a cluttered toolbox, you can quickly grab the wrench you need, enhancing your efficiency.
Moreover, this hack can be adapted to fit various sizes of wrenches, ensuring that all your tools have a designated spot. By keeping your wrenches organized, you can also prevent them from getting lost or damaged, prolonging their lifespan.
18. DIY Wooden Shelf Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Creating a wooden shelf with holes to serve as a charging station for power tools is another brilliant hack. This eliminates cable clutter and allows for easy charging, increasing the lifespan of your tools. By having a dedicated space for charging, you can ensure that your tools are always ready for use when you need them.
In addition, this shelf can be customized to fit your specific needs, allowing you to organize your tools in a way that works best for you. Whether you have a few power tools or an extensive collection, this hack will help you maintain order in your garage.
17. Wall Tracks Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Installing wall tracks is a game-changer for storing heavier items vertically. This frees up floor space, reduces potential trip hazards, and keeps your equipment in good condition. By utilizing wall space, you can maximize your garage’s storage capacity and create a more organized environment.
Furthermore, wall tracks can be adjusted to accommodate various items, making them a versatile solution for any garage. This hack not only enhances organization but also makes it easier to access your tools and equipment when needed.
16. Decorative Baskets Image: Etsy Using decorative baskets for storage is both stylish and functional. Baskets provide flexible storage options and can easily be moved around as your needs change. This hack allows you to keep your garage looking neat while also adding a touch of personality to the space.
Moreover, baskets can be used to store a variety of items, from sports equipment to gardening supplies. By categorizing your items in baskets, you can quickly find what you need without sifting through piles of clutter.
15. PVC Pipe Holders Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Repurposed PVC pipes are durable, cheap, and customizable, making them a perfect fit for any garage. They can be used to create an innovative shoe organizer that mounts on the back of a closet door. This hack not only keeps your shoes organized but also saves valuable floor space.
Additionally, PVC pipes can be used for various storage solutions, such as holding tools or gardening supplies. Their versatility makes them an excellent choice for anyone looking to enhance their garage organization.
14. DIY Fishing Rod Holders Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Using a pool noodle and a PVC pipe as a fishing rod organizer prevents your rods from tangling and getting damaged. This way, your gear is always ready for your next fishing trip. By keeping your fishing rods organized, you can ensure that they remain in good condition and are easy to access when you’re ready to hit the water.
Moreover, this hack is a cost-effective solution that requires minimal materials, making it accessible for everyone. Whether you’re an avid fisherman or just starting, this organization method will help you keep your gear in top shape.
13. Car Door Protection Image: Doordefender Attaching a pool noodle to the wall acts as a cushion for your car door, saving you from potential repair costs from dings and scratches. This simple hack can prevent damage to both your car and the items stored in your garage.
By implementing this protective measure, you can park with confidence, knowing that your car is safe from accidental bumps. This hack is especially useful in tight garage spaces where door swings can be a concern.
12. Use Mason Jars Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Organizing small items like nails, screws, nuts, and bolts in mason jars keeps your small items contained and easy to find. This method reduces the chance of losing these tiny but essential items, making your garage a more efficient workspace.
Mason jars can be labeled for easy identification, allowing you to quickly grab what you need without searching through cluttered drawers. This hack not only enhances organization but also adds a rustic charm to your garage.
11. Wooden Screwdriver Racks Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Installing a screwdriver rack near your workspace ensures your screwdrivers are always within reach. This maximizes efficiency and ensures you always have the right tool at your fingertips. By keeping your screwdrivers organized, you can streamline your projects and reduce frustration.
Additionally, this hack can be customized to fit various sizes of screwdrivers, ensuring that all your tools have a designated spot. This organization method will help you maintain a tidy workspace and improve your overall productivity.
10. Add Brackets To Your Garage Door Image: Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Using your garage door for storage optimizes unused space. By adding brackets, you can maximize your garage’s storage capacity and keep frequently used tools out of the way. This hack allows you to utilize every inch of your garage, making it a more functional space.
Moreover, this method can be adapted to fit various tools and equipment, ensuring that everything has its own place. By keeping your tools organized, you can easily find what you need when working on projects.
9. Repurpose Plastic Bottles Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Using old plastic bottles as storage containers for small items can help keep things organized. This repurposing reduces waste and ensures you can easily find small items like nuts, bolts, and nails. By giving new life to plastic bottles, you can create a sustainable storage solution that benefits both your garage and the environment.
Additionally, this hack is a cost-effective way to organize your garage without spending money on expensive storage solutions. It’s a simple yet effective method that anyone can implement.
8. Invest In Lockers Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Investing in lockers can provide dedicated storage space for each family member or different activities. This can minimize clutter and make finding specific items easier. By having a designated space for each person, you can ensure that everyone’s items are organized and easily accessible.
Moreover, lockers can be customized to fit your garage’s design, adding a stylish touch to your space. This hack not only enhances organization but also promotes responsibility among family members, encouraging them to keep their items tidy.
7. Hang Your Tires Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Hanging your tires from the wall can save a significant amount of floor space and prevent any accidental damage to them. This also keeps them easily accessible when they need to be changed. By utilizing vertical space, you can create a more organized garage environment.
Additionally, this method can be adapted to fit various tire sizes, ensuring that all your tires have a designated spot. This hack is especially useful for those with limited garage space, allowing you to maximize your storage capacity.
6. Sports Ball Storage System Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Creating a bungee cord sports ball holder helps you keep all your sports equipment in one place. This makes it easier for you to find and retrieve your sports balls when you need them, preventing them from rolling around the garage.
Moreover, this hack is a fun and creative way to organize your sports gear, adding a playful touch to your garage. By keeping your sports equipment organized, you can encourage family members to participate in activities and make the most of your garage space.
5. Hanging Planters Image: Mod Musings Using hanging planters for storage can provide a visually appealing way to store smaller objects. This can add a touch of style to your garage while keeping things organized. By utilizing vertical space, you can create a more inviting environment in your garage.
Additionally, hanging planters can be used to store a variety of items, from gardening supplies to small tools. This hack not only enhances organization but also adds a decorative element to your space.
4. Arrange Snowboards Vertically Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Using a snowboard and ski rack to keep your gear tidy protects them from potential damage. This organization system can extend the lifespan of your equipment and make it easier to access when you need it. By keeping your snowboards organized, you can ensure they remain in good condition for your next adventure.
Moreover, this hack can be adapted to fit various sizes of snowboards and skis, ensuring that all your gear has a designated spot. This method not only enhances organization but also promotes a love for outdoor activities.
3. Storage Cubbies Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Cubbies offer dedicated spaces for various items, making them easy to locate. This method also encourages you to maintain the orderliness of your garage. By categorizing your items in cubbies, you can quickly find what you need without sifting through cluttered spaces.
Additionally, cubbies can be customized to fit your garage’s design, adding a stylish touch to your space. This hack not only enhances organization but also promotes a sense of pride in your garage.
2. Cardboard Paper Tubes Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Repurposing cardboard tubes for tool storage helps you keep long tools organized and easily accessible. Plus, it’s a great way to recycle and save money. By giving new life to cardboard tubes, you can create a sustainable storage solution that benefits both your garage and the environment.
Additionally, this hack is a cost-effective way to organize your garage without spending money on expensive storage solutions. It’s a simple yet effective method that anyone can implement.
1. Reuse Kitchen Cabinets Image: Alan’s Factory Outlet Youtube Reusing old kitchen cabinets in your garage provides ample storage space and helps reduce waste. This can give a second life to your old cabinets and help you keep your garage organized. By repurposing kitchen cabinets, you can create a stylish and functional storage solution that enhances your garage’s design.
Moreover, this hack allows you to customize your storage to fit your specific needs, ensuring that everything has its own place. By keeping your garage organized, you can create a more enjoyable workspace for all your projects.

author: Cliff Pinckard | cpinckard@cleveland.com
title: Influential rock band's members file legal motions against each other
text:
The legal actions are coming in fast with Jane’s Addiction.
Members of the influential alt-rock band on Wednesday sued their former lead singer, Perry Farrell, after a fight broke out between Farrell and guitarist Dave Navarro during a show in September, The Guardian reports.
In response, Farrell, 66, filed a legal complaint against the band, claiming he was the victim of the incident, Variety reports.
According to Deadline, Navarro, 58, the band’s guitarist, bassist Eric Avery and drummer Stephen Perkins sued Farrell for $10 million Wednesday in Los Angeles Superior Court. The lawsuit accuses Farrell of a “brutal and unprovoked” onstage attack on Navarro.
The lawsuit says the incident led to the canceling several tour dates and the loss of millions of dollars, Deadline reports.
The incident occurred during a Jane’s Addiction show in Boston. Reports say Farrell attacked Navarro as the song “Ocean” came to an end. Video reportedly shows Farrell intentionally shoulder-bumping Navarro, then yelling and pushing toward the guitarist. Navarro tried to hold him back, but Farrell threw a punch across Navarro’s chest.
The band’s crew members rush onto the stage and, along with bassist Eric Avery, restrain Farrell, who struggles with them before finally being escorted away.
Farrell’s wife, Etty Lau Farrell, said in a post on Instagram after the incident that “Clearly there had been a lot of tension and animosity between the members.”
“Perry’s frustration had been mounting, night after night, he felt that the stage volume had been extremely loud and his voice was being drowned out by the band,” Etty Lau wrote. “Perry had been suffering from tinnitus and a sore throat every night. But when the audience in the first row started complaining up to Perry, cussing at him that the band was (playing) too loud and that they couldn’t hear him, Perry lost it.”
Deadline reports Farrell’s legal motion accuses Navarro playing loudly during the concert in Chicago as part of “a longstanding pattern of harassment and bullying [Farrell] has suffered at the hands of the other members of the band, and the various passive aggressive, or sometimes just aggressive ‘tricks’ they would use to undermine his performances on stage.”
The motion accuses Navarro of attacking Farrell and his wife backstage following the show. Farrell also says he was given no say in ending the tour.
“This is yet another clear example of the group uniting to isolate and bully frontman Perry Farrell,” a representative of Farrell said in a statement to People Magazine. “The timing of this baseless lawsuit is no coincidence — it was filed only after they caught wind of legal action coming from our side. It’s a transparent attempt to control the narrative and present themselves as the so-called ‘good guys’ — a move that’s both typical and predictable."

author: Nouvelles
title: Prévisions de pluie… basses températures à Ismaïlia
text:
22h18
Jeudi 31 octobre 2024
Ismaïlia – Masrawy :
Le gouvernorat d’Ismaïlia a connu une baisse notable des températures, avec l’apparition de brouillard d’eau dans les zones désertiques et sur les autoroutes du gouvernorat, dans un contexte d’attente de pluie.
Le gouvernorat d’Ismaïlia a annoncé avoir élevé le niveau maximum de préparation pour faire face à la vague d’intempéries.
À son tour, le gouverneur d’Ismailia a ordonné d’élever le degré de préparation pour accueillir la saison hivernale et faire face à toute forme d’eau de pluie et d’accumulations torrentielles, et de faire face immédiatement à toute situation d’urgence, ainsi que d’avancer dans l’examen et le suivi des mesures prises. les procédures et les mesures qui ont été prises dans toutes les unités locales à leurs différents niveaux.
Le gouverneur d’Ismaïlia a également ordonné la création de sous-salles d’opérations et leur liaison avec la salle centrale du gouvernorat en coordination avec le Réseau national d’urgence pour recevoir tout rapport concernant les mauvaises conditions météorologiques et discuter d’un certain nombre de scénarios de crise et d’urgence. gestion au cas où un événement surviendrait, ou si le gouvernorat serait exposé à une vague de pluie et de pluies torrentielles au cours de la période à venir.
Le gouverneur a souligné que tous les responsables doivent rapidement examiner les mesures et les préparatifs qui ont été pris pour faire face à toute crise, déterminer les mécanismes pour y faire face, tester tous les sites, examiner les équipements et mécanismes techniques et électriques et achever rapidement la désinfection des égouts. , évacuation des eaux pluviales, réseaux de drainage, désinfection des canaux et des égouts et isolation de tous les câbles sortant des transformateurs dans les secteurs ruraux, en tenant compte de la nécessité de faire face à l’événement de manière proactive et non réactive.
Le gouverneur a ordonné de respecter les horaires de travail dans les secteurs des services, en particulier les jours fériés et les jours de repos, et d’augmenter le degré de préparation dans toutes les salles d’opération 24 heures sur 24, afin de faire face rapidement à tout événement attendu à tout moment.
